com.card.association

Class CardAssociation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.card.association.CardAssociation

  • public class CardAssociation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the API of the Card Association system

    Parameter maps:

    Param Type Required Description
    cardNumber String Yes Card number
    owner String Yes Card owner
    cvvCode String Yes CVV Code
    dateExpired Date Yes Expired Date
    command String Yes Transaction Command: "pay", "refund"
    amount Number Yes Payment Amount
    createdDate Date Yes Created Date
    transactionContent String Yes Transaction cotent, e.g. Pay for fare certificates in TVM

    Return: code and transaction id of the transaction. If not success, there is no transaction id.
    For example: code=0&transactionId=192912& or code=1&
    Return code descriptions:
    # Return code Description
    1 0 Successful Transaction
    2 1 Invalid Card
    3 2 Not Enough Balance
    4 3 Internal Error

    Examples: 
     
 public process(){
 		CardAssociation cardAssociation = CardAssociation.connect();
		if (cardAssociation == null) {
			System.out.println("Cannot connect to card association");
			return;
		}

		StringBuilder queryBuilder = new StringBuilder(CardAssociation.CARD_ASSOCIATION_LINK + '?');
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "cardNumber", "0123456789");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "owner", "user1");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "cvvCode", "123");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "dateExpired", "24/04/2025");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "command", "pay");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "amount", "20.1");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "createdDate", "26/12/2022");
		addParameter(queryBuilder, "transactionContent", "Pay for TVM");

		String query = queryBuilder.toString();
		String transactionResult = cardAssociation.processTransaction(query);

		System.out.println(transactionResult);
	}

	public static void addParameter(StringBuilder query, String key, String value) {
		query.append(key.replace(" ", "%20"));
		query.append("=");
		query.append(value.replace(" ", "%20"));
		query.append("&");
	}

    • Field Detail

      • CARD_ASSOCIATION_LINK

        public static java.lang.String CARD_ASSOCIATION_LINK

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static CardAssociation connect()
        Connect to the card association system for processing transactions to cards
        Returns:
        true if connect to card association system successfully, false otherwise

      • processTransaction

        public java.lang.String processTransaction(java.lang.String queryString)
        Parameters:
        queryString - a query string of the request sent to the card association system for processing a transaction.
        Syntax: uri?parameter=value&
        Param Type Required Description
        cardNumber String Yes Card number
        owner String Yes Card owner
        cvvCode String Yes CVV Code
        dateExpired Date Yes Expired Date
        command String Yes Transaction Command: "pay", "refund"
        amount Number Yes Payment Amount
        createdDate Date Yes Created Date
        transactionContent String Yes Transaction cotent, e.g. Pay for fare certificates in TVM
        Returns:
        A string including code and transaction id (if success).
        Syntax: code=returnCode&transactionId=cardTransactionId&
        For example: code=0&transactionId=192912& or code=1&
        # Return code Description
        1 0 Successful Transaction
        2 1 Invalid Card
        3 2 Not Enough Balance
        4 3 Internal Error
